You get a NPE when creating  new folder in a site manager that has no sites. You
likely want to just disable the operation in this case.

STEPS
1) Open a fresh eclipse
2) Open a site manager
3) Select New->Folder
4) NPE

I've seen this too. I can fix this easily.

Fixed. To reproduce select a remote folder that contains files then double-click
on a file in the right table view. The selection is removed from the left folder
tree. Then select New > Folder. This was causing the NPE and later the
indexOutOfBounds.
The selection in the tree cannot be assumed since it can be cleared by the above
scenario.
